name: Space Jelly
description:
Space Jelly is a platformer designed for Godot Wild Jam #14 under the theme "shadows". Play as a jellyfish in space that can swim in the shadows and jump in the light. Avoid spikes and being sucked into space whirlpools as you make your way through 10 short and sweet levels!

Font is Chewy: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Chewy 
Sound effects by jdwasabi: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack
Music is Come and Find Me by Eric Skiff: https://ericskiff.com/music/
